comments:
EPF: EPF 1.2 build  20070410-1825
Steps:
1. Create a CP named 'cp01'
2. In library tree, select 'cp01' and using context menu -> Rename
3. Rename 'cp01' to 'cp0101'
-->Problem:
(1) No dirty flag is shown after renaming the CP
4. Enter some value to Main description field of 'cp01' and save it
-->Problem:
(2) A 'Save Error' window is shown:
   IUPA0020E: Error saving file

Remark:
1. No this problem when rename a method content element
2. Attachments screen image file is added

Created an attachment (id=63465)
out of synch when saving CP

Reassigning to Phong. Here is the exception
